_source.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
_source.long_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.
_source.pricing_details: Available as a perpetual license or as a subscription.
_source.target_audience: WhatsUp Gold enables SMB and Enterprise IT teams (network, server, application and DevOps) to easily and flexibly monitor and control their infrastructure.

category_features.name: Approval Process Control
category_features.definition: Streamline and manage the process of granting permission to the correct parties throughout task progression

category_features.name: Attestation
category_features.definition: Collect, track and store acknowledgements that policies have been read and understood

category_features.name: Audit Trail
category_features.definition: Track changes and view date/time records

category_features.name: Policy Creation
category_features.definition: Create new policies or alter existing policies

category_features.name: Policy Library
category_features.definition: A repository of all existing policies

category_features.name: Policy Metadata Management
category_features.definition: Group policies by type for easy classification and discovery

category_features.name: Policy Training
category_features.definition: Train and educate employees on existing and/or new procedures and policies

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: CPU Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor performance details involving CPU/memory utilization

category_features.name: Credential Management
category_features.definition: Change passwords so that the locally stored password on the client can be updated at the same time it is modified on the server

category_features.name: Email Monitoring
category_features.definition: Ability to oversee and optimize the operations of a mail server

category_features.name: Event Logs
category_features.definition: A record of actions or occurrences recognized by software

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Virtual Machine Monitoring
category_features.definition: Manages the operation of virtualized environment on top of a physical host machine

related_products.short_desc: PowerDMS is a policy and compliance management platform for high-trust organizations, and provides a repository to manage policies.
related_products.features: PowerDMS is the leading policy management platform for high-trust organizations. Create, update, distribute, and track your policies from a single, unified platform. Make sure important policies are accessible by employees anytime, anywhere. Join over 4,000 customers in public and private sectors who trust PowerDMS to help them reduce risk, simplify processes, and hold employees accountable. Read our customer's reviews to see how PowerDMS has helped them and can help you.

related_products.short_desc: The JumpCloud Directory Platform reimagines the directory as a complete platform for identity, access, and device management.
related_products.features: JumpCloud's cloud directory enables internal IT departments, MSPs, VARs/distributors, and DevOps teams to securely and easily enable access to any IT resource, from anywhere. Enable conditional access policies, get visibility into user activity, easily assign group memberships, and more.

related_products.features: Healthcare and safety management platform that assists clinicians with claims processing, risk mitigation, feedback collection & more.

related_products.short_desc: Transform employees into a cybersecurity asset through automated Human Risk Management (HRM).
related_products.features:
usecure enables businesses to analyse their employee security posture against evolving cyber threats, reduce security incidents caused by human error and demonstrate compliance with core security standards.

By combining user-tailored security awareness training programs, custom phishing simulations, ongoing dark web monitoring and simplified policy management processes into one easy-to-manage solution for transforming staff into a cyber security asset.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your policy process from origination to review to attestations to exceptions & connect to every regulation, framework & control.
related_products.features: Onspring's policy management solution helps you move past redundant, manual procedures and into a streamlined, automated program to organize piecemealed data into a centralized repository for proper analysis and access. Utilize a connected policy repository that updates to reflect regulations & control changes. Stop micromanaging policy enforcement with automated reviews & updates. Identify policy exceptions with real-time reporting from attestations. Communicate policy purposes to teams.

related_products.short_desc: GDPR Compliance Platform for Online Businesses. Simplify murky legal requirements with our cookie consent & policy management solutions
related_products.features: From our cookie consent manager to our attorney-crafted legal policies, Termly offers a full suite of privacy compliance solutions. Satisfy the strict requirements of privacy laws across multiple countries, such as the GDPR, ePrivacy Directive, and CalOPPA. Begin with a comprehensive cookie scan to categorize your cookies, generate a compliant cookie policy, and create a custom cookie consent banner. Then, build a full arsenal of polices, including a privacy policy and terms & conditions.

related_products.short_desc: Information security and compliance software for Risk Assessment, Policies, Business Continuity Planning, Vendor Management, and more.

Software features include secure document storage, unlimited users, roles & responsibilities, tasks, email reminders, and incredible support.

related_products.short_desc: Policy management software that allows you to easily automate, deliver and maintain your organisation's policy management lifecycle.
related_products.features:
Our policy management software automates your policy management lifecycle and provides the "evidential weight" required to protect organisations from brand degradation and reputational threats.

From creation and management to publishing and delivery, our cloud-based policy management software increases policy participation, easily obtains employee attestation to key policies and embeds a culture of compliance.

related_products.short_desc: SmartCompliance is the #1 certificate of insurance management software for risk managers, consultants, constructors and brokers.

Simplify your Certificate of Insurance (COI) tracking system and avoid manual process with SmartCompliance, the #1 COI Management Software. 
The easy-to-use certificate tracking software helps professionals streamline compliance requirements by automating COI tracking & collection, eliminating manual data entry, and ensuring vendor compliance. 
Mitigate your risk of an underinsured claim by centralizing your tracking process and compliance reporting on one cloud-based platform.

related_products.short_desc: Save time and resources by keeping your activities in one centralized platform and automating your manual tasks with Risk Cloud.
related_products.features: With LogicGate Risk Cloud, you can manage your policies and procedures in one centralized platform. No more reworking and duplicating efforts to maintain policies. You can quickly and easily find all of your activities in one place, and automate manual tasks to save time and resources.

As policies are developed, changes are captured in version control and files are routed for approval. When published, workflow notifies individuals or groups and confirms they have read and understand. Reporting tracks everything for auditing and provides complete visibility.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compliance software enables an organization to monitor internal controls to ensure that standards and regulations are met. Compliance solutions that focus on financial and accounting compliance standards, such as the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, help organizations streamline financial documentation, audit trails, and reporting. Compliance solutions that focus on environmental compliance standards help organizations monitor and report on emissions, hazmat procedures, and regulatory policies. Compliance software is related to Accounting software, and EHS Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top HIPAA Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of HIPAA Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: HIPAA Compliance Software allows medical practices to ensure compliance with federal HIPAA regulations. These solutions help keep patients' Protected Health Information secure, and can also provide risk management, compliance, and audit planning.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Risk Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Risk Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Risk Management software helps organizations reduce exposure to enterprise and operational risks, improving quality and minimizing losses through better management of data. These solutions track incidents, facilitate evaluation of corrective actions, monitor enterprise-level performance, and promote compliance. Business intelligence and exception management are typical features of Risk Management software. For related software solutions see Financial Risk Management software and Compliance software.

Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.

category_features.name: Bandwidth Monitoring
category_features.definition: Measure the actual bandwidth available on a local network (LAN or WiFi)

category_features.name: Baseline Manager
category_features.definition: Define network parameters and threshold settings to monitor network health and take necessary precautions

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: Provide insights on the network's performance and health on a continuous real-time basis

category_features.name: IP Address Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the IP addresses of the incoming traffic

category_features.name: Internet Usage Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the amount of internet bandwidth and speed utilized  each resource in a shared network

category_features.name: Network Analysis
category_features.definition: Run tests on the network to find the root cause of the network issues

category_features.name: Network Resource Management
category_features.definition: Manage efficient and effective use of network resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Track current service level agreements based on quantifiable metrics

category_features.name: Uptime Reporting
category_features.definition: Track the time for which a designated network or a website is available to the users over a given period of time

category_features.name: Web Traffic Reporting
category_features.definition: Keep track of the amount of data sent and received  the visitors to a website

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: Assign color coding and icons

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Device Auto Discovery
category_features.definition: Periodically scan the network for external services and take pre-defined actions upon discovery

category_features.name: Hierarchical Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model in which the network map is organized and visualized as a tree-like structure

category_features.name: Location-Based Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model based on the geographic location of users

category_features.name: Map Exporting
category_features.definition: Export a map or layout to share

category_features.name: On-Demand Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model where users create their own map using data they specify

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self-Updating Maps
category_features.definition: Dynamic maps that update whenever network changes are made

category_features.name: Deployment Management
category_features.definition: Manage the processes involved when making the application ready for use

category_features.name: For MSPs
category_features.definition: Application is geared towards use by managed services providers

category_features.name: IT Asset Management
category_features.definition: Inventories and tracks changes to hardware and software configurations

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Network Monitoring
category_features.definition: Tracks and makes accessible data on the health of servers and other network components

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Real-time Alerts
category_features.definition: Receive notification of issues as soon as they occur

category_features.name: Remediation Management
category_features.definition: Identify and orchestrate execution of actions needed to restore systems to optimal conditions

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Real Time Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track system's health and performance continuously with information and updates being available instantly at any point in time

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

All plans include unlimited devices, meaning you only pay per technician. Try Atera for free today!

similar_products.features: Paessler PRTG Enterprise Monitor is vendor agnostic. It can monitor almost every device, application, or service using all common monitoring protocols or the documented API. But even beyond classic IT, it supports industry-specific protocols to monitor medical devices, shop floors, IoT setups, and much more. It's one solution for your entire monitoring, from infrastructure to network, from applications to cloud services, from databases to storage, from virtual environments to IoT, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: 500,000 reasons to try PRTG Network Monitor: That's the number of users that rely on it every day. Why not start your trial right away?
similar_products.features: Say hello to PRTG Network Monitor, our award-winning and all-inclusive monitoring solution. It takes care of everything happening in your IT infrastructure, featuring an easy-to-use and intuitive interface, as well as our mind-blowing customer support. PRTG scales to networks of any size, making life so much easier for our customers with growing networks, as they can simply stick with PRTG. Plus, it obviously saves costs by avoiding critical outages, while optimizing the overall network quality.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Application Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Application Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Application Performance Management software manages and measures application performance levels and status, enabling accurate, real-time observations of system health and capacity. Organizations use the sophisticated diagnostic tools provided by Application Performance Management software to make strategic resource decisions regarding their technology operations. These applications provide an integrated solution for ongoing observation, evaluation and forecasting as well as historical assessments. Application Performance Management software is related to Network Monitoring software and IT Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Computer Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Computer Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Computer Security software automates the security and monitoring of computer systems from malware, threats and unauthorized use. These applications scan and monitor an organization's computer network to evaluate potential vulnerabilities. Additionally, Computer Security solutions provide customizable network security solutions as well as those preconfigured for a variety of regulatory standards. Computer Security software provides for real-time reporting on network security as well as incident reports for potential security breaches. Computer Security software is related to Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Data Center Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Data Center Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Data Center Management software allows users to monitor and control all connected networks and devices across an entire organization. This type of software allows for application delivery, trouble shooting, and reporting across the organizational network. Data Center Management software is related to IT Asset Management software, Data Storage software, Database Management software, Network Monitoring software, and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Management software provides the tools and process for controlling and monitoring computer networks, including: operating systems, applications, network devices, security measures, mainframes, access control systems, web services, and databases. Organizations use IT Management applications to manage activities across their systems, evaluating capacity, user activities, software inventory and installation, server availability, and virus or malware protection. IT Management software is related to Application Performance Management software, Business Continuity software, Database Management software, Server Management software, Network Monitoring software and Network Security software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Network Security software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Network Security tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Network Security software prevents unauthorized access to a computer network. Organizations use these applications to prevent unauthorized, malicious or inadvertent intrusions into or usage of secure systems. Network Security solutions are designed to recognize legitimate traffic over today's complex enterprise networks and isolate abnormal events for further investigation as well as to perform key security audit and regulatory compliance functions. Features can include anti-spam, anti-virus, and intrusion detection. Network Security software is related to Computer Security software and Network Monitoring software.

_source.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
_source.long_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.
_source.pricing_details: Available as a perpetual license or as a subscription.
_source.target_audience: WhatsUp Gold enables SMB and Enterprise IT teams (network, server, application and DevOps) to easily and flexibly monitor and control their infrastructure.

category_features.name: Bandwidth Monitoring
category_features.definition: Measure the actual bandwidth available on a local network (LAN or WiFi)

category_features.name: Baseline Manager
category_features.definition: Define network parameters and threshold settings to monitor network health and take necessary precautions

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: Provide insights on the network's performance and health on a continuous real-time basis

category_features.name: IP Address Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the IP addresses of the incoming traffic

category_features.name: Internet Usage Monitoring
category_features.definition: Monitor the amount of internet bandwidth and speed utilized  each resource in a shared network

category_features.name: Network Analysis
category_features.definition: Run tests on the network to find the root cause of the network issues

category_features.name: Network Resource Management
category_features.definition: Manage efficient and effective use of network resources

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Track current service level agreements based on quantifiable metrics

category_features.name: Uptime Reporting
category_features.definition: Track the time for which a designated network or a website is available to the users over a given period of time

category_features.name: Web Traffic Reporting
category_features.definition: Keep track of the amount of data sent and received  the visitors to a website

category_features.name: Server Monitoring
category_features.definition: Continuously scan servers on a designated network to monitor health and search for any irregularities or failures

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: Assign color coding and icons

category_features.name: Compliance Tracking
category_features.definition: Track business operations to ensure they are performed correctly and according to industry regulations

category_features.name: Device Auto Discovery
category_features.definition: Periodically scan the network for external services and take pre-defined actions upon discovery

category_features.name: Hierarchical Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model in which the network map is organized and visualized as a tree-like structure

category_features.name: Location-Based Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model based on the geographic location of users

category_features.name: Map Exporting
category_features.definition: Export a map or layout to share

category_features.name: On-Demand Mapping
category_features.definition: Mapping model where users create their own map using data they specify

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self-Updating Maps
category_features.definition: Dynamic maps that update whenever network changes are made

category_features.name: Deployment Management
category_features.definition: Manage the processes involved when making the application ready for use

category_features.name: For MSPs
category_features.definition: Application is geared towards use by managed services providers

category_features.name: IT Asset Management
category_features.definition: Inventories and tracks changes to hardware and software configurations

category_features.name: Mobile Access
category_features.definition: Access the software remotely via mobile devices

category_features.name: Network Monitoring
category_features.definition: Tracks and makes accessible data on the health of servers and other network components

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Real-time Alerts
category_features.definition: Receive notification of issues as soon as they occur

category_features.name: Remediation Management
category_features.definition: Identify and orchestrate execution of actions needed to restore systems to optimal conditions

related_products.short_desc: Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications.
related_products.features: Google Cloud Platform is a set of modular cloud-based services that allow you to create anything from simple websites to complex applications. New customers get $300 in free credits to fully explore and conduct an assessment of Google Cloud. You won't be charged until you upgrade. Google Cloud Platform offers a modular-based platform providing build and scale services to businesses of any size within any industry. In addition to cloud storage and scalable data warehouses with built-in machine learning, Google Cloud Platform provides relational and non-relational databases for transactions, complex queries, streaming, offline sync, and more. A range of tools for document storage, data warehousing, security key enforcement, app creation, API management, AI and machine learning are also available.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based virtualization platform which helps enterprises with data consolidation, infrastructure security and remote support.
related_products.features:
Cloud-based virtualization platform which helps enterprises with data consolidation, infrastructure security and remote support.
VMware streamlines the journey for organizations to become digital businesses that deliver better experiences to their customers and empower employees to do their best work. Our software spans App Modernization, Cloud, Networking & Security and Digital Workspace.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one remote IT management solution for MSPs, IT consultants and IT departments. Try Atera for free today!
related_products.features: Atera offers a comprehensive network monitoring for MSPs and IT Professionals. The platform provides one integrated solution: full remote monitoring and management (RMM), PSA, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model also helps managed IT service providers scale their business while providing continued best-in-class service. All plans include unlimited devices, meaning you only pay per technician. Try Atera for free today!

related_products.short_desc: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance info for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - in the cloud or on-premises.
related_products.features: Get at-a-glance up/down status and performance information for network devices, servers, storage and wireless - whether in the cloud or on-premises. Expand your management tool kit by adding proactive monitoring for network traffic, applications, virtual environments and device configurations  all through the same intuitive interface. Automatically discover and map your entire network and use customized dashboards to get the information you need to streamline troubleshooting.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
related_products.features: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.

related_products.short_desc: Thousands of MSPs and IT Departments use Kaseya VSA Network Monitoring software to automate IT. Get your demo today!
related_products.features: MSPs and internal IT teams get visibility into network performance with Kaseya VSA. Monitor all aspects of network connected devices. Maintain up-time and track key metrics on monitored endpoints and ensure network and system availability. Optimize network performance and eliminate network bottlenecks and performance issues.

related_products.short_desc: Pulseway's Network Monitoring software gives you total visibility across your network. Easily Monitor & Control your Network devices.
related_products.features: Pulseway's Network Monitoring software gives you total visibility across your network. Automatic discovery and diagramming, makes managing your network simple, intuitive and efficient. Discover your entire IT network and mass deploy the Pulseway agent in minutes so you can have a better insight into what issues are affecting you.

related_products.short_desc: New Relic is the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools
related_products.features: New Relic One empowers engineers with a data-driven approach to planning, building, deploying and running software. Offering the only unified data platform that empowers engineers to get all telemetry paired with powerful full-stack analysis tools, New Relic helps engineers get past the what to uncover the why. This improves uptime, reliability and efficiency to deliver exceptional customer experiences that fuel growth. Uncover the why with New Relic.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk helps you investigate, monitor, analyze, and act on all of your organizations data.
related_products.features: Trusted by 92 of the fortune 100, Splunk is a customizable data analytics platform that empowers you to investigate, monitor, analyze and act. From IT to security to business operations, Splunk is the data-to-everything platform that enables you to take action in real-time. With Splunk, you can predict and prevent IT problems, streamline your entire security stack, minimize unplanned downtime, and explore and visualize business processes for increased transparency all in one platform.

related_products.short_desc: 500,000 reasons to try PRTG Network Monitor: That's the number of users that rely on it every day. Why not start your trial right away?
related_products.features: Say hello to PRTG Network Monitor, our award-winning and all-inclusive monitoring solution. It takes care of everything happening in your IT infrastructure, featuring an easy-to-use and intuitive interface, as well as our mind-blowing customer support. PRTG scales to networks of any size, making life so much easier for our customers with growing networks, as they can simply stick with PRTG. Plus, it obviously saves costs by avoiding critical outages, while optimizing the overall network quality.

related_products.short_desc: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services.
related_products.features: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services. We empower Dev and Ops teams to plan for service disruptions and stay in control during incidents. Opsgenie centralizes alerts, notifies the right people reliably, and enables them to take rapid action. Our deep integrations with 200+ ITSM tools enable you to break down silos between Dev and IT Teams, correlate incidents to code deployments, and easily measure the full impact of a major incident.

similar_products.short_desc: ManageEngine OpManager is 5 in 1 integrated network management software for performance monitoring, fault diagnosis & troubleshooting.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine OpManager is an integrated network management platform that helps large enterprises, service providers, and SMEs manage their data centers & IT infrastructure efficiently and cost effectively. It offers network performance monitoring, physical and virtual server monitoring, traffic analysis, configuration management, firewall log management and IP address management. It provides business view, email/sms based alerts, workflow automation, customized reports and combined snapshot view

similar_products.features: The N-able N-central? remote monitoring and management platform is designed to help managed services providers handle complex networks with ease. With extensive automation and in-depth configurability options, security features like antivirus, endpoint detection and response, patch management, and integrated backup, N-central is built to help MSP businesses efficiently manage intricate networks from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is affordable software that can help you detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance issues.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Network Performance Monitor (NPM) is a powerful and affordable solution that can help you quickly detect, diagnose, and resolve network performance problems and outages. NPM provides advanced network troubleshooting for on-premise, hybrid, and cloud services with critical path hop-by-hop analysis. NPM's comprehensive coverage is designed to enable an IT professional to reduce mean outage time, see return on network investments & determine how to reallocate resources for future health.

similar_products.short_desc: Automate can take care of any repetitive IT maintenance task or process, monitor mission critical network components and so much more!
similar_products.features: Whether you're an experienced MSP or an hourly rate one-man shop, the ConnectWise Automate, formerly LabTech, remote monitoring and management platform can help you significantly improve your operational productivity and efficiency by leveraging the power of IT automation. Automate's functionality can take care of any repetitive IT maintenance task or process, monitor mission critical network components and automatically run auto-remediation programs, and so much more! Start your demo!

similar_products.short_desc: Network performance monitoring and diagnostics tool that enables NetOps to analyse network traffic and troubleshoot network problems.
similar_products.features: Flowmon is a professional tool for effective network troubleshooting, performance monitoring, capacity planning, encrypted traffic analysis and cloud monitoring. Instead of just the red/green infrastructure status, it helps NetOps teams to understand user experience while keeping the amount of data noise and analytical work to a minimum. The Flowmon solution is a part of the Kemp product portfolio.

similar_products.short_desc: Anticipate, troubleshoot, and prevent performance issues regardless of where workloads, applications, or users are located.
similar_products.features:
End user experience monitoring and troubleshooting software, with embedded intelligence and automation,
that enables IT pros to anticipate, troubleshoot, and document performance issues regardless of
where workloads, applications, or users are located.

Proactively anticipate user experience issues before they happen, provide the correlated analytics to troubleshoot the problem quickly when they do and documentation of root cause so that performance issues can be permanently resolved.

similar_products.short_desc: Network monitoring solution that provides everything you expect, plus automation, huge scale, easy integration and simple pricing.
similar_products.features: NMIS manages a vast array of devices on simple to complex networks. Extend NMIS with advanced modules to get access to additional capabilities. Deploy wherever you need and only pay for the devices being managed. Fast deployment, simple pricing, hugely scalable, flexible and easy to integrate into your business. Save time with automation. Perfect for on-premises, private and public cloud. Talk to us about what you need and we'll have it covered. Book a no-obligation demo now.
